Please contact the seller via our email dealer form or on 0116 214 9136 to reconfirm any details before purchasing. See terms & conditions for further info. Review Rating Ford was a little late in launching a compact people carrier but the Focus C-MAX (rebadged as just the C-MAX in 2007) made a big impact in the market. read more Superb interior build quality, solid feel, neat styling No seven seat option, not as practical or flexible as some people carriers Review provided by: The following features are fitted on this car...
